mapper.insert: insert into subject (name, content, types, files, teacher_id, category) values (#{name},#{content},#{types},#{files},#{teacherId},#{category})
mapper.delete: delete from subject where id in #{item}
mapper.select:
select s.name,u.name as teacherName,s.types,s.files from subject s left join teacher t on s.teacher_id=t.id left join user u on t.user_id=u.id where 1=1
and (s.name like '%${param}%' or u.name like '%${param}%')
and (s.types like '${typeId},%' or s.types like '%,${typeId}' or s.types like '%,${typeId},%')
and s.category=#{category}
select name, content, types, files, teacher_id as teacherId, category from subject where id=#{subjectId}
